Articles.Content:
Fobos Grunt was a Russian Phobos sample return mission. but sadly it failed.

Fobos Grunt included a Chinese space probe named Yinghuo-1

Pictures

![KABGdH5.png](http://i.imgur.com/KABGdH5.png)

![2HgnurJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/2HgnurJ.png)

![KbpaMHA.png](http://i.imgur.com/KbpaMHA.png)

![V92iMF4.png](http://i.imgur.com/V92iMF4.png)

Yinghuo-1

![C3WSQDS.png](http://i.imgur.com/C3WSQDS.png)

![65uHkFx.png](http://i.imgur.com/65uHkFx.png)

Lander

![fBldIdr.png](http://i.imgur.com/fBldIdr.png)
But can it hop around Ike? You have a challenge.
This is a replica. It's not designed to hop around Ike.

> 
> This is a replica. It's not designed to hop around Ike.

The Phobos series was designed to do so. If it's a replica, give it some of it's features.
You need to more specific. Are you talking about Fobos 1 and 2 Spacecraft or Fobos-Grunt

> 
> You need to more specific. Are you talking about Fobos 1 and 2 Spacecraft or Fobos-Grunt

Fobos 1 and 2. Wrong craft. It's still a good craft though.

I wonder why all my replicas get comments like this. You did this wrong and this wrong. And the size is wrong and everything is wrong.![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Nice replica, I hadn't heard about this mission before.

> 
> I wonder why all my replicas get comments like this. You did this wrong and this wrong. And the size is wrong and everything is wrong.![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Because half the comments are constructive criticism! Also, in replicas, you have the real thing to compare... In any case, I really have nothing to add, since I'm not familiar with the RL design, but don't sweat it! We mean well. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It is an interesting spacecraft in any case. I can't shake the feeling that there are too many parts there, but that is my thing, pushing people to be more part effcient! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Rune. And those who don't mean well... I stopped listening to them long ago, I suggest you do the same.

> 
> Because half the comments are constructive criticism! Also, in replicas, you have the real thing to compare... In any case, I really have nothing to add, since I'm not familiar with the RL design, but don't sweat it! We mean well. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> It is an interesting spacecraft in any case. I can't shake the feeling that there are too many parts there, but that is my thing, pushing people to be more part effcient! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> Rune. And those who don't mean well... I stopped listening to them long ago, I suggest you do the same.

 But some people are like trying to find something on crafts to complain about. And you can see when they are trying to complain because they complain about stuff thats actully right. For exemple they say that the diameter is wrong when it's not. And thats annoying.

Im not talking about you.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T07:52:13Z" title="07/17/2015 07:52  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by Lime**

> 
> Im not talking about you.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I've gone and done it again! Let me delete it XD.
